Package it.polimi.softeng.connectionProtocol.client

Class ClientSideRMI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.connectionProtocol.client.ClientSideRMI
public class ClientSideRMI extends Object
Class used when the client wants to establish an RMI connection
